articles.description: Honda H’ness CB350 and CB350RS are now also available at 35 CSD depots.
articles.content:
Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India on Thursday announced that its Hness CB350, CB350RS is now available in Canteen Store Departments (CSD) in multiple cities across the country.

articles.title: India bags ten bids for eight oil and gas blocks in latest bid round - Business Standard
articles.description: Four companies, including 3 state-owned, put in 10 bids for the 8 oil and gas blocks on offer in India's latest round of bidding for exploration acreage, says the Directorate General of Hydrocarbons.
articles.content: As many as four companies, including three state-owned, put in 10 bids for the eight oil and gas blocks on offer in India's latest round of bidding for exploration acreage, according to the Directora… [+4809 chars]

articles.title: New BMW X3 Diesel Version Launched At Rs 66.50 Lakh - India Car News
